snippet.title: Wildmender | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist Wildmender: https://bit.ly/PlayWildmender

Unearth the past to protect the future 🌱

In Wildmender, you face the challenge of restoring the environment. Explore the desert alone or with your friends. Craft new tools and use them to bring life back to a dying world. Befriend local wildlife and defend the land from the vicious wraiths who seek to corrupt it. Delve into the mystery behind a fallen civilization. Take on their teachings, learn from their mistakes, and master the arcane arts that once allowed them to thrive. 

👉 Coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC in 2023! 👈

Follow Wildmender on:

Twitter: https://bit.ly/WildmenderTwitter
Instagram: https://bit.ly/WildmenderInsta
Facebook: https://bit.ly/WildmenderFB

---

Don't forget to join the Kwalee Gaming Discord and follow us on social media for more exciting updates about our upcoming titles!

💬 Discord: https://bit.ly/KwaleeGamingDiscord
💙 Facebook: https://bit.ly/KwaleeGamingFB
🐦 Twitter: https://bit.ly/KwaleeGamingTwitter
📷 Instagram: https://bit.ly/KwaleeGamingInsta
🎵 TikTok: https://bit.ly/KwaleeGamingTT
